thread.title: Maureen OHara Hollywoods Queen Of Technicolor Dies At 95
thread.title_full: Maureen OHara Hollywoods Queen Of Technicolor Dies At 95

title: Maureen OHara Hollywoods Queen Of Technicolor Dies At 95
text:
Maureen O'Hara, Hollywood's 'Queen Of Technicolor,' Dies At 95 
NPR Sunday 25th October, 2015 
Irish-American actress Maureen O'Hara, seen in 1947 and known as the "Queen of Technicolor," died Saturday at her home in Boise, Idaho. She was 95.
